entry.title: Bauum讨论了哈德拉毛-阿拉伯体育场重新启动鱼磨工厂的问题; ; ;2025-01-02T14:58:57Z; ;2025-01-02T14:58:57Z; ;...哈德拉毛的鱼，威胁着 < b>;鱼类财富;它导致哈德拉毛大量鱼类灭绝。 Bauum 强调需要保护海洋资源...; ; ;; ; ;; ;tag:google.com,2013:googlealerts / feed:3254373122060608998; ;信息部长<b>;也门</b>;：“重建<b>;也门</b>;”的项目和举措提供直接的积极影响并支持可持续发展</stitle>; <link href="https://www.google.com/url?rct=j&sa=t&url=https://www.alriyadh.com/2111791&ct=ga &cd=CAIyHzIyOTI5OTZmYWY3YWMwNGY6Y29tOnpoLUNOOlVTOkw&usg=AOvVaw2E_TTuisT1hgkYpIBdMZsp"/>; <发布>;2025-01-02T12:05:20Z</发布>; <更新>;2025-01-02T12:05:20Z</更新>; <content type="html">;... <b>;也门</b >;：“重建<b>;也门</b>;...<b>;鱼类资源</b>;以及发展和支持政府能力的项目和举措<b>;也门</b>;，以及<b>;也门</b>;各个省份的发展计划。</content>; <author>; <name>;</name>; </author>; </entry>;<entry>; <id>;tag:google.com,2013:googlealerts/feed:12058837250164032494</id>; <title type="html">;Al-Soqatri 和 Lamlas 检查渔港修复项目的工作进展<b>;Al-Samaki</b>; 在亚丁...当地新闻</stitle>; <link href="https://www.google.com/url?rct=j&sa=t&url=https://ar.pressbee.net/show9089196.html%3Ftit le%3D%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D8%25B3%25D9%2582%25D8%25B7%25D8%25B1%25D9%258A-%25D9%2588%25D9%25 84%25D9%2585%25D9%2584%25D8%25B3-%25D9%258A%25D8%25AA%25D9%2581%25D9%2582%25D8%25AF%25D8%25A7% 25D9%2586-%25D8%25B3%25D9%258A%25D8%25B1-%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D8%25B9%25D9%2585%25D9%2584-%2 5D9%2581%25D9%258A-%25D9%2585%25D8%25B4%25D8%25B1%25D9%2588%25D8%25B9-%25D8%25AA%25D8%25A3%25D 9%2587%25D9%258A%25D9%2584-%25D9%2585%25D9%258A%25D9%2586%25D8%25A7%25D8%25A1-%25D8%25A7%25D9% 2584%25D8%25A7%25D8%25B5%25D8%25B7%25D9%258A%25D8%25A7%25D8%25AF-%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D8%25B 3&ct=ga&cd=CAIyHzIyOTI5OTZmYWY3YWMwNGY6Y29tOnpoLUNOOlVTOkw&usg=AOvVaw1e6pbSLOZ92HLpiGvPb8Vz"/>; <published>;2025-01-02T08:21:23Z</published>; <updated>;2025-01-02T08:21:23Z</updated>; <content type="html">;农业、灌溉和渔业部长萨利姆·索卡特里少将与国务部长兼首都亚丁省长艾哈迈德·哈米德·拉姆拉斯今天在办公厅部委、障碍...</content>; <作者>; <名称>;</名称>; </作者>; </entry>; </feed>;
